short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Theme Explorer allows you to view important information about the themes installed on your Shopify store.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Your Shopify Management with Theme Explorer

Theme Explorer is a Chrome extension designed for Shopify store owners and developers. It provides quick access to essential theme details including Theme ID, creation and update dates, and the theme name. Direct links to the theme’s JSON, Theme Customiser, and code editor simplify your workflow.

Key Features of Theme Explorer:

  • Detailed Theme Information: Get theme IDs, names, and update/creation dates immediately.
  • Quick Access Links: Jump straight to your theme’s JSON, customise your theme in the Theme Customiser, or edit directly in the code editor with one click.
  • Storefront Insights: On any Shopify storefront, Theme Explorer reveals the live theme name and offers quick links to Theme ID, Theme Preview URL, and Theme Editor URL.
